page.title: 06TROON Crnwll- Entertainment
page.content: TROON is a fairly active village in providing its own day time entertainment, for example the Womens Institute meets reguarly and is well attended. However TROON does lack evening entertainment especially for the young. It has a very strong Old Folks Club as a large proportion of the population are retired. For the younger generation there are active youth groups and a Toc H group for both girls and boys. TROON holds various annual events such as a carnival, sports days, horse show and gymkhana. In the village hall they hold an annual pantomime, but most of the time it is used for bingo. TROON also holds various handicraft shows and floral art displays. The TROON Singers, which are mainly from the Chapel Choir, give concerts throughout the year.
